US lawmakers urge VW to exit Xinjiang operationsThe chair of a U.S. House Committee on China and the top Democrat on the panel urged Volkswagen to halt operations in Xinjiang after thousands of vehicles with a small Chinese-made electronic component were held at U.S. ports. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:45:21 GMT VVVK2SE2K5KLPLOWE47YTXQGBE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/us-lawmakers-urge-vw-exit-xinjiang-operations-2024-02-22/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
Global trade rift widening as Ukraine war passes two-year markTwo years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, there are clear signs that the global economy is fragmenting into two separate blocs and that multilateral trade rules that have underpinned commerce for nearly 30 years are under threat. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 14:25:18 GMT ZLLR65PR2RJIRGRDH2ZXJAFQLM https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-trade-rift-widening-ukraine-war-passes-two-year-mark-2024-02-22/Philip Blenkinsop市场宏观问题
Heidelberg Materials weighs U.S. listing to tackle valuation gapHeidelberg Materials is weighing a listing in the United States as a way to potentially tackle a geographical gap in valuation, its chief executive told analysts on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 14:22:18 GMT LCT2LJ7TQZJI5LSBDFWEXADYIQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/heidelberg-materials-weighs-us-listing-tackle-valuation-gap-2024-02-22/Reuters市场交易
Chinese electric truck start-up Windrose explores production in Europe, CEO saysChinese electric heavy truck start-up Windrose plans to outsource manufacturing of its vehicles to automaking partners in Europe, its founder and CEO said on Thursday, as it seeks to take on rivals Tesla and Mercedes Benz in the region. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:52:57 GMT YNQQOS5VDVKJFGF73ORDAH4IYQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-electric-truck-start-up-windrose-explores-production-europe-ceo-says-2024-02-22/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China asks World Court to speak out on 'unlawful' Israeli occupationChina asked the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Thursday to give its opinion on Israel's occupation of the Palestinian Territories, which it said was illegal. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:51:36 GMT OMQORUXSWFK53ES2RUI6SKOF2M https://www.reuters.com/world/china-asks-world-court-speak-out-unlawful-israeli-occupation-2024-02-22/Reuters世界
Nvidia has begun sampling two new AI chips for China market, says CEONvidia is currently offering customers samples of its two new artificial intelligence chips aimed at the China market, its CEO Jensen Huang said, in a bid to defend its market dominance in the country now threatened by U.S. export curbs. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 11:23:44 GMT XTQAOJE4VBNG3BBBAEHG754QTE https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidia-has-begun-sampling-two-new-ai-chips-china-market-says-ceo-2024-02-22/Stephen Nellis, Yelin Mo技术被破坏
